00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00008 #include "strings.h"
00009 #include "installer.h"
00010 #include "compiler.h"
00011 
00012 bool installPackage(MavenCompiler* c, string package) {
00013         // look for the package
00014         cout << "Looking for " << package << "... ";
00015         string packagePath = findPackage(package);
00016         
00017         if(packagePath == "") {
00018                 cout << "Unknown package '" << package << "'" << endl;
00019                 return false;
00020         }
00021         cout << "Found" << endl;
00022         
00023         // if its online download it
00024         if(packagePath.length() > 7 && packagePath.substr(0, 7) == "http://") {
00025                 cout << "Downloading " << packagePath << "... ";
00026                 cout << "Done" << endl;
00027         }
00028         
00029         // uncompress if required
00030         if(packagePath.length() > 4 && packagePath.substr(packagePath.length() - 4, 4) == ".zip") {
00031                 cout << "Uncompressing " << packagePath << "... ";
00032 #if MAVEN_OS == 1
00033                 system((string("unzip -u ") + packagePath + " > /dev/null").c_str());
00034 #else
00035                 system((string("unzip -qq -o ") + packagePath).c_str());
00036 #endif
00037                 cout << "Done" << endl;
00038         }
00039         
00040         // look for the installer script
00041         ifstream installFile;
00042         installFile.open((package + "/" + package + ".installer").c_str(), ios::in);
00043         if(!installFile.is_open())
00044                 die("Could not find installer file");
00045         
00046         // run the installer script
00047         string line = "", heading = "";
00048         bool foundOS = false;
00049         while(!installFile.eof()) {
00050                 char ch = installFile.get();
00051                 if(ch == '\n' || ch == '\r') {
00052                         line = trim(line);
00053                         if(line.length() > 0 && line[0] == '[') {
00054                                 heading = line.substr(1, line.length() - 2);
00055                                 if(heading == "other") foundOS = true;
00056                         } else if(heading == "other") {
00057                                 if(!processInstallerLine(c, line, package))
00058                                         exit(1);
00059                         }
00060                         line = "";
00061                 } else line += ch;
00062         }
00063         
00064         if(!foundOS)
00065                 die("This package is not available for your operating system.");
00066         
00067         // install was successful
00068         return true;
00069 }
